Text: The Last English King (1997) is a historical novel by English writer Julian Rathbone.

Text: The Last English King:  The novel covers the time of the Battle of Hastings.
Triplets:<The Last English King
3:
Text: The Last English King:  The story starts with Walt returning to his home at Iwerne in Dorset four years after the Battle of Hastings.

<Text: The Last English King:  He had fled England after the defeat of the Anglo-Saxons and had spent the time travelling across Europe and Asia Minor.>
Triplets:<The Last English King
5:

Text: The Last English King:  The story of his journey from Constantinople via Nicomedia and Nicaea to Side is then recounted in parallel with his recollections of the time before the battle, such as his accompanying Harold to William of Normandy's attack on Dinan.
